summary: A unit‑test module that validates the implementation of regression metrics (MAE, MSE, PSNR, RMSE) provided by the MONAI library. It defines lightweight NumPy‑based reference functions and a test suite that compares MONAI metric outputs against these references across different tensor shapes, checks handling of mismatched dimensions, and confirms correct behavior for identical inputs.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of regression evaluation components used in medical imaging AI workflows, supporting quality assurance and continuous integration testing.
